job.title: Campaign Manager
job.description: pstrongOverviewstrongppPicnicHealth is all about making medical records easy to access and using data to power the next frontier of medical research We work directly with patients to give them the only tool anywhere that truly provides all of their medical records from any doctor or healthcare system in the USin an easytouse secure online dashboard Patients can then choose to contribute their unique data to scientific research which helps researchers accelerate breakthroughs in care for the diseases they care about To date weve helped tens of thousands of patients partnered with some of the worlds largest biopharma companies and raised more than 35M including from Felicis Ventures Amplify Partners and Y Combinator Post Series B were growing quickly in revenue partnerships and people  its an exciting time to join the PicnicHealth teamnbspppbrppstrongThe OpportunitystrongppPicnicHealth is seeking a Campaign Manager as we build out our direct to patient marketing teamnbspppAs a Campaign Manager youll be joining our small but growing Marketing team with the huge opportunity to work on endtoend patient recruitment campaigns to bring more patients to the PicnicHealth platform Youll understand our target patient population and then create a plan for how to recruit them to join the platform Youre excited to be creative and actively experiment with new and different ways of recruiting patients to see what sticks for each group You love the nuts and bolts of marketing from analyzing channel performance to creating projections that can be used for future programs You have a great eye for detail and are an eager project manager capable of juggling the many requirements of a partner to get a new campaign up and running You will collaborate closely with teams throughout the company and report directly to the Head of Growth and Recruitment with the opportunity to build your skillset and expand your impact over timenbspppWe are looking for an exceptional project and stakeholder manager who is ambitious adaptable and eager to learn with a track record of taking initiative and thriving in a resultsoriented fastpaced environment While we are looking for someone with empathy for our users primarily patients with chronic illnesses experience in healthcare is not required or even necessarily preferred Our users are first and foremost people who want useful compelling product experiences just like any consumernbspThats what we give themnbspnbspppbrppstrongWhat youll do at PicnicHealthnbspstrongpullistrongDrive executionstrongnbspDevelop execute and manage plans for achieving our patient recruitment goalslilistrongOwn resultsstrongnbspEvaluate efficacy of tactics and develop standard reporting that can be shared throughout the organization Optimize through rigorous testinglilistrongSupport our recruitment channelsstronglilistrongCome up with creative ways of identifying where our target audience is and how to reach them using various platform tools and data sourcesstrongliliCreate strong relationships with recruitment partnersliliManaging multiple partner interactions and deadlines simultaneously with high qualityliliBuild structured execution plans from highlevel objectivesnbspliliCollaborate with our clinical data experts to guide partners to get the most value out of the Picnic Research data andliliManage collateral requirements creation and delivery to partnerslilistrongProject and analyze performancestronglilistrongTrack performance of channels and identify areas for improvementstrongliliCreate projections for new campaignsliliDevelop frameworks for projecting future performance and feasibility based on past performance of related campaignsnbsplilistrongRepresent and champion PicnicHealthstrongnbspin daytoday partnership management and program managementlilistrongBoost the teamstrong Collaborate effectively with teammates in marketing sales creative operations engineering and partnerships to raise the bar in executing all of our campaignsliulpbrppstrongYou are a strong candidate ifnbspstrongpulliYou have 3 years of experience in business strategy marketing andor partnerships at leading SaaS software company or strategy consulting firm and a Bachelors Degree in businessrelated field of studyliliYoure an exceptional project manager researching structuring and managing project plans and communication with internal and external stakeholdersliliYoure comfortable in a fastpaced startup environment and excited to flex into new areas of marketing and partnerships as the work evolvesnbspliliYoure detailoriented and highly organized while flawlessly managing multiple projects simultaneouslyliliYoure able to understand and analyze data with a high degree of comfortnbspliliYou have strong interpersonal skills for patient success and engagementnbspnbspliliYoure motivated to be amazing in your role and ultimately improve the lives of patientsliulpbrppstrongWhy join PicnicHealthstrongppAt PicnicHealth you get to solve real problems with real solutions great tech and great peoplenbspppYou also getpulliCompetitive salarynbspliliComprehensive benefits including above market Health Dental VisionliliFamily friendlynbspliliFlexible time offlili401k planliliFree PicnicHealth accountliliEquipment and internet funds for home office set upnbspliulpbrppFor this role PicnicHealth is open to full time or contractppbrppDue to COVID19 currently all roles are remote As of October 2021 we will offer a hybrid set up team members in the Bay Area will be able to work from the SF office on a flexible schedule remote team members will be expected to travel to inperson meetings 46 times a yearppbrppstrongEqual Opportunity StatementstrongppPicnicHealth is committed to promoting an inclusive work environment free of discrimination and harassment We value a diverse and balanced team where everyone can belongp
